verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> came בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> And it came to pass in the days אָ֠חָז <WH271> of Ahaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹתָ֨ם <WH3147> of Jotham בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֻזִּיָּ֜הוּ <WH5818> of Uzziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> went up רְצִ֣ין <WH7526> [that] Rezin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king אֲ֠רָם <WH758> of Syria וּפֶ֨קַח <WH6492> and Pekah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְמַלְיָ֤הוּ <WH7425> of Remaliah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> toward Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to war עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> but יָכֹ֖ל <WH3201> against it but could לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> not prevail עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וַיֻּגַּ֗ד <WH5046> And it was told לְבֵ֤ית <WH1004> the house דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> of David לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying נָ֥חָֽה <WH5117> is confederate אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> Syria עַל־ <WH5921> in אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> with Ephraim וַיָּ֤נַע <WH5128> was moved לְבָבוֹ֙ <WH3824> And his heart וּלְבַ֣ב <WH3824> and the heart עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> of his people כְּנ֥וֹעַ <WH5128> are moved עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> as the trees יַ֖עַר <WH3293> of the wood מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> with רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> the wind

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יְשַׁעְיָהוּ֒ <WH3470> unto Isaiah צֵא־ <WH3318> Go forth נָא֙ <WH4994> now לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> now to meet אָחָ֔ז <WH271> Ahaz אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you וּשְׁאָ֖ר יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7610> thou and Shearjashub בְּנֶ֑ךָ <WH1121> thy son אֶל־ <WH413> at קְצֵ֗ה <WH7097> at the end תְּעָלַת֙ <WH8585> of the conduit הַבְּרֵכָ֣ה <WH1295> pool הָעֶלְיוֹנָ֔ה <WH5945> of the upper אֶל־ <WH413> on מְסִלַּ֖ת <WH4546> in the highway שְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> field כוֹבֵֽס׃ <WH3526> of the fuller's

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> to him הִשָּׁמֵ֨ר <WH8104> unto him Take heed וְהַשְׁקֵ֜ט <WH8252> and be quiet אַל־ <WH408> no תִּירָ֗א <WH3372> fear וּלְבָבְךָ֙ <WH3824> heart אַל־ <WH408> no יֵרַ֔ךְ <WH7401> faint מִשְּׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> for the two זַנְב֧וֹת <WH2180> tails הָאוּדִ֛ים <WH181> firebrands הָעֲשֵׁנִ֖ים <WH6226> of these smoking הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these בָּחֳרִי־ <WH2750> for the fierce אַ֛ף <WH639> anger רְצִ֥ין <WH7526> of Rezin וַאֲרָ֖ם <WH758> with Syria וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and of the son רְמַלְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH7425> of Remaliah

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> because כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָעַ֥ץ <WH3289> counsel עָלֶ֛יךָ <WH5921> against אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> Because Syria רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> have taken evil אֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> Ephraim וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and the son רְמַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH7425> of Remaliah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> against thee saying

נַעֲלֶ֤ה <WH5927> Let us go up בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> against Judah וּנְקִיצֶ֔נָּה <WH6973> and vex וְנַבְקִעֶ֖נָּה <WH1234> it and let us make a breach אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <WH413> in וְנַמְלִ֥יךְ <WH4427> therein for us and set מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> a king בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> in the midst אֵ֖ת <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> of it [even] the son טָֽבְאַֽל׃ <WH2870> of Tabeal ס
כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תָק֖וּם <WH6965> It shall not stand וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> come

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> For the head אֲרָם֙ <WH758> of Syria דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> [is] Damascus וְרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> and the head דַּמֶּ֖שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus רְצִ֑ין <WH7526> [is] Rezin וּבְע֗וֹד <WH1157> and within שִׁשִּׁ֤ים <WH8346> and within threescore וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years יֵחַ֥ת <WH2844> broken אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> shall Ephraim מֵעָֽם׃ <WH5971> that it be not a people

וְרֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> And the head אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> of Ephraim שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> [is] Samaria וְרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> and the head שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria בֶּן־ <WH1121> son רְמַלְיָ֑הוּ <WH7425> [is] Remaliah's אִ֚ם <WH518> If לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <WH539> If ye will not believe כִּ֖י <WH3588> surely לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תֵאָמֵֽנוּ׃ <WH539> surely ye shall not be established ס
וַיּ֣וֹסֶף <WH3254> again יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֶל־ <WH413> to אָחָ֖ז <WH271> unto Ahaz לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שְׁאַל־ <WH7592> Ask לְךָ֣ א֔וֹת <WH226> thee a sign מֵעִ֖ם <WH5973> from יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God הַעְמֵ֣ק <WH6009> it either in the depth שְׁאָ֔לָה <WH7585> Sheol א֖וֹ <WH176> or הַגְבֵּ֥הַּ <WH1361> or in the height לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> above
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said אָחָ֑ז <WH271> But Ahaz לֹא־ <WH3808> nor אֶשְׁאַ֥ל <WH7592> I will not ask וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֲנַסֶּ֖ה <WH5254> test אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֖א <WH4994> now בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> ye now O house דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David הַמְעַ֤ט <WH4592> [Is it] a small thing מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> too הַלְא֣וֹת <WH3811> for you to weary אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of men כִּ֥י <WH3588> for תַלְא֖וּ <WH3811> but will ye weary גַּ֥ם <WH1571> again אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> Therefore יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> himself shall give אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> Therefore the Lord ה֛וּא <WH1931> Himself לָכֶ֖ם א֑וֹת <WH226> you a sign הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold הָעַלְמָ֗ה <WH5959> Behold a virgin הָרָה֙ <WH2030> shall conceive וְיֹלֶ֣דֶת <WH3205> and bear בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וְקָרָ֥את <WH7121> and shall call שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name עִמָּ֥נוּ אֵֽל׃ <WH6005> Immanuel

חֶמְאָ֥ה <WH2529> Butter וּדְבַ֖שׁ <WH1706> and honey יֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> shall he eat לְדַעְתּ֛וֹ <WH3045> that he may know מָא֥וֹס <WH3988> to refuse בָּרָ֖ע <WH7451> the evil וּבָח֥וֹר <WH977> and choose בַּטּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> the good

כִּ֠י <WH3588> For בְּטֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> before יֵדַ֥ע <WH3045> shall know הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> For before the child מָאֹ֥ס <WH3988> to refuse בָּרָ֖ע <WH7451> the evil וּבָחֹ֣ר <WH977> and choose בַּטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> the good תֵּעָזֵ֤ב <WH5800> forsaken הָאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whose אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you קָ֔ץ <WH6973> that thou abhorrest מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> shall be שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> of both מְלָכֶֽיהָ׃ <WH4428> her kings

יָבִ֨יא <WH935> shall bring יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> and וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> on עַמְּךָ֮ <WH5971> upon thee and upon thy people וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִיךָ֒ <WH1> and upon thy father's יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> such לֹא־ <WH3808> have never בָ֔אוּ <WH935> that have not come לְמִיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from the day סוּר־ <WH5493> departed אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> that Ephraim מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> from Judah אֵ֖ת <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> [even] the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִשְׁרֹ֤ק <WH8319> shall hiss יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [that] the LORD לַזְּב֔וּב <WH2070> for the fly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בִּקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> that [is] in the uttermost part יְאֹרֵ֣י <WH2975> of the rivers מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְלַ֨דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <WH1682> and for the bee אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> is in בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> that [is] in the land אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria

וּבָ֨אוּ <WH935> And they shall come וְנָח֤וּ <WH5117> and shall rest כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> will all בְּנַחֲלֵ֣י <WH5158> valleys הַבַּתּ֔וֹת <WH1327> all of them in the desolate וּבִנְקִיקֵ֖י <WH5357> and in the holes הַסְּלָעִ֑ים <WH5553> of the rocks וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הַנַּ֣עֲצוּצִ֔ים <WH5097> and upon all bushes וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all הַנַּהֲלֹלִֽים׃ <WH5285> and upon all thorns

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In the same day הַה֡וּא <WH1931> he יְגַלַּ֣ח <WH1548> shave אֲדֹנָי֩ <WH136> shall the Lord בְּתַ֨עַר <WH8593> with a razor הַשְּׂכִירָ֜ה <WH7917> that is hired בְּעֶבְרֵ֤י <WH5676> [namely] by them beyond נָהָר֙ <WH5104> the river בְּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the head וְשַׂ֣עַר <WH8181> and the hair הָרַגְלָ֑יִם <WH7272> of the feet וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> will also אֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּקָ֖ן <WH2206> the beard תִּסְפֶּֽה׃ <WH5595> and it shall also consume ס

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he יְחַיֶּה־ <WH2421> shall nourish אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> [that] a man עֶגְלַ֥ת <WH5697> cow בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> a young וּשְׁתֵּי־ <WH8147> and two צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> sheep

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become מֵרֹ֛ב <WH7230> And it shall come to pass for the abundance עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> [that] they shall give חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> of milk יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> he shall eat חֶמְאָ֑ה <WH2529> butter כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חֶמְאָ֤ה <WH2529> for butter וּדְבַשׁ֙ <WH1706> and honey יֹאכֵ֔ל <WH398> shall every one eat כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הַנּוֹתָ֖ר <WH3498> that is left בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will become כָל־ <WH3605> every מָק֗וֹם <WH4725> [that] every place אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> will become שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> shall be where there were a thousand גֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> vines בְּאֶ֣לֶף <WH505> at a thousand כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> silverlings לַשָּׁמִ֥יר <WH8068> it shall [even] be for briers וְלַשַּׁ֖יִת <WH7898> and thorns יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> will become

בַּחִצִּ֥ים <WH2678> arrow וּבַקֶּ֖שֶׁת <WH7198> and with bows יָ֣בוֹא <WH935> shall [men] come שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there כִּי־ <WH3588> because שָׁמִ֥יר <WH8068> shall become briers וָשַׁ֖יִת <WH7898> and thorns תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become כָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> thither because all the land

וְכֹ֣ל <WH3605> for all הֶהָרִ֗ים <WH2022> And [on] all hills אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בַּמַּעְדֵּר֙ <WH4576> with the mattock יֵעָ֣דֵר֔וּן <WH5737> that shall be digged לֹֽא־ <WH3808> you will not תָב֣וֹא <WH935> there shall not come thither שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there יִרְאַ֖ת <WH3374> the fear שָׁמִ֣יר <WH8068> of briers וָשָׁ֑יִת <WH7898> and thorns וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will become לְמִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH4916> but it shall be for the sending forth שׁ֔וֹר <WH7794> of oxen וּלְמִרְמַ֖ס <WH4823> and for the treading שֶֽׂה׃ <WH7716> of lesser cattle פ
